<< builtin functions manager feval >>

clearfun

Clear an built-in function.

Syntax

l = clearfun(function_name)
l = clearfun(function_handle)

Input argument

function_name

a string: function name.

function_handle

a function handle.

Output argument

l

a logical

Description

clearfun clears built-in.

Example

cos(3)
a = clearfun('cos')
cos(3)

sin(3)
b = clearfun(str2func('sin'))
sin(3)

See also

feval.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
